General.Name: Rainforest Resources Inc
General.Description: Rainforest Resources Inc. operates in the forestry sector. It also produces carbon credit certificates; and develops and exports natural spring water. The company was formerly known as Amalgamated Gold & Silver Inc. and changed its name to Rainforest Resources Inc. in December 2015. Rainforest Resources Inc. is headquartered in Anna Maria, Florida.
General.Address: 316 Tarpon Street, Anna Maria, FL, United States, 34218
